title: EP - 14 - Kate Casey & Heather McDonald Get Heated Over RHOBH
description:
Kate and comedian Heather McDonald argue about Real Housewives of Beverly Hills and true crime cases, she forces her friend Chad to watch a vintage episode of Real Housewives of Orange County, and her friend Kirsten discusses Arranged and the Sister Wives offspring’s wedding registries.
